title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Because the statue has 42 arms, it is often called the Guanyin of the Thousand Arms.” [From China Today, November 1990, p. 15. Submitted by Charles G. Mendoza, North Miami.]
